verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> [Tle-da-Vid, of David מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> Shir. [or] Song יָק֣וּם <WH6965> ya-Kum arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him Let God יָפ֣וּצוּ <WH6327> ya-Fu-tzu be scattered אוֹיְבָ֑יו <WH341> 'oy-Vav; let his enemies וְיָנ֥וּסוּ <WH5127> ve-ya-Nu-su him flee מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו <WH8130> me-san-'Av, let them also that hate מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> mip-pa-Nav. before

כְּהִנְדֹּ֥ף <WH5086> ke-hin-Dof is driven away עָשָׁ֗ן <WH6227> 'a-Shan, As smoke תִּ֫נְדֹּ֥ף <WH5086> tin-Dof [so] drive [them] away כְּהִמֵּ֣ס <WH4549> ke-him-Mes melteth דּ֭וֹנַג <WH1749> Do-nag as wax מִפְּנֵי־ <WH6440> mip-pe-nei- before אֵ֑שׁ <WH784> 'Esh; the fire יֹאבְד֥וּ <WH6> yoe-Du perish רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im, [so] let the wicked מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei at the presence אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. of God

וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים <WH6662> ve-tzad-di-Kim, But let the righteous יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <WH8055> yis-me-Chu be glad יַֽ֭עַלְצוּ <WH5970> Ya-'al-tzu let them rejoice לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ <WH7797> ve-ya-Si-su rejoice בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <WH8057> ve-sim-Chah. yea let them exceedingly

שִׁ֤ירוּ׀ <WH7891> Shi-ru Sing לֵֽאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> le-lo-Him unto God זַמְּר֪וּ <WH2167> zam-me-Ru sing praises שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo to his name סֹ֡לּוּ <WH5549> Sol-lu extol לָרֹכֵ֣ב <WH7392> la-ro-Chev him that rideth בָּ֭עֲרָבוֹת <WH6160> Ba-'a-ra-Vot upon the heavens בְּיָ֥הּ <WH3050> be-Yah JAH שְׁמ֗וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo, by his name וְעִלְז֥וּ <WH5937> ve-'il-Zu and rejoice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> le-fa-Nav. before

אֲבִ֣י <WH1> 'a-Vi A father יְ֭תוֹמִים <WH3490> Ye-to-mim of the fatherless וְדַיַּ֣ן <WH1781> ve-dai-Yan and a judge אַלְמָנ֑וֹת <WH490> al-ma-Not; of the widows אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, [is] God בִּמְע֥וֹן <WH4583> bim-'on habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. in his holy

אֱלֹהִ֤ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him God מ֘וֹשִׁ֤יב <WH3427> mo-Shiv setteth יְחִידִ֨ים׀ <WH3173> ye-chi-Dim the solitary בַּ֗יְתָה <WH1004> Bay-tah, in families מוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> mo-Tzi he bringeth out אֲ֭סִירִים <WH615> 'A-si-rim those which are bound בַּכּוֹשָׁר֑וֹת <WH3574> bak-ko-sha-Rot; with chains אַ֥ךְ <WH389> 'ach Only ס֝וֹרֲרִ֗ים <WH5637> so-ra-Rim, but the rebellious שָׁכְנ֥וּ <WH7931> sha-che-Nu dwell צְחִיחָֽה׃ <WH6707> tze-chi-Chah. in a dry

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, O God בְּ֭צֵאתְךָ <WH3318> Be-tze-te-cha when thou wentest forth לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּצַעְדְּךָ֖ <WH6805> be-tza'-de-Cha when thou didst march בִֽישִׁימ֣וֹן <WH3452> vi-shi-Mon through the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz The earth רָעָ֨שָׁה׀ <WH7493> ra-'A-shah shook אַף־ <WH637> 'af- also שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim the heavens נָטְפוּ֮ <WH5197> na-te-Fu also dropped מִפְּנֵ֪י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei at the presence אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God זֶ֥ה <WH2088> zeh itself סִינַ֑י <WH5514> si-Nai; [even] Sinai מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei [was moved] at the presence אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

גֶּ֣שֶׁם <WH1653> Ge-shem rain נְ֭דָבוֹת <WH5071> Ne-da-Vot a plentiful תָּנִ֣יף <WH5130> ta-Nif didst send אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; Thou O God נַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <WH5159> na-cha-la-te-Cha thine inheritance וְ֝נִלְאָ֗ה <WH3811> ve-nil-'Ah, when it was weary אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You כֽוֹנַנְתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3559> Cho-nan-Tah. whereby thou didst confirm

חַיָּתְךָ֥ <WH2416> chai-ya-te-Cha Thy congregation יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <WH3427> ya-she-vu- hath dwelt בָ֑הּ Vah; תָּ֤כִ֥ין <WH3559> ta-Chin hast prepared בְּטוֹבָתְךָ֖ <WH2896> be-toa-te-Cha of thy goodness לֶעָנִ֣י <WH6041> le-'a-Ni for the poor אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. therein thou O God

אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai The Lord יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> yit-ten- gave אֹ֑מֶר <WH562> 'O-mer; the word הַֽ֝מְבַשְּׂר֗וֹת <WH1319> ham-vas-se-Rot, of those that published צָבָ֥א <WH6635> tza-Va [was] the company רָֽב׃ <WH7227> Rav. great

מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei Kings צְ֭בָאוֹת <WH6635> Tze-va-'ot of armies יִדֹּד֣וּן <WH5074> yid-do-Dun did flee יִדֹּד֑וּן <WH5074> yid-do-Dun; apace וּנְוַת <WH5116> u-ne-vat and she that tarried בַּ֝֗יִת <WH1004> Ba-yit, at home תְּחַלֵּ֥ק <WH2505> te-chal-Lek divided שָׁלָֽל׃ <WH7998> sha-Lal. the spoil

אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- When תִּשְׁכְּבוּן֮ <WH7901> tish-ke-Vun Though ye have lien בֵּ֪ין <WH996> bein among שְׁפַ֫תָּ֥יִם <WH8240> she-Fat-Ta-yim among the pots כַּנְפֵ֣י <WH3671> kan-Fei [yet shall ye be as] the wings י֭וֹנָה <WH3123> Yo-nah of a dove נֶחְפָּ֣ה <WH2645> nech-Pah covered בַכֶּ֑סֶף <WH3701> vak-Ke-sef; with silver וְ֝אֶבְרוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH3422> ve-'ev-ro-Tei-ha, with yellow בִּֽירַקְרַ֥ק <WH84> bi-rak-Rak and her feathers חָרֽוּץ׃ <WH2742> cha-Rutz. gold

בְּפָ֘רֵ֤שׂ <WH6566> be-Fa-Res scattered שַׁדַּ֓י <WH7706> shad-Dai When the Almighty מְלָ֘כִ֤ים <WH4428> me-La-Chim kings בָּ֗הּ Bah, תַּשְׁלֵ֥ג <WH7949> tash-Leg in it it was [white] as snow בְּצַלְמֽוֹן׃ <WH6756> be-tzal-Mon. in Salmon

הַר־ <WH2022> har- The hill אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him of God הַר־ <WH2022> har- [is as] the hill בָּשָׁ֑ן <WH1316> ba-Shan; of Bashan הַ֥ר <WH2022> har hill גַּ֝בְנֻנִּ֗ים <WH1386> gav-nun-Nim, an high הַר־ <WH2022> har- [as] the hill בָּשָֽׁן׃ <WH1316> ba-Shan. of Bashan

לָ֤מָּה׀ <WH4100> Lam-mah Why תְּֽרַצְּדוּן֮ <WH7520> te-ratz-tze-Dun Why leap הָרִ֪ים <WH2022> ha-Rim mountains גַּבְנֻ֫נִּ֥ים <WH1386> gav-Nun-Nim ye ye high הָהָ֗ר <WH2022> ha-Har, the mountain חָמַ֣ד <WH2530> cha-Mad desireth אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [which] God לְשִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <WH3427> le-shiv-To; to dwell in אַף־ <WH637> 'af- yet יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh yea the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <WH7931> yish-Kon will dwell לָנֶֽצַח׃ <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach. [in it] for ever

רֶ֤כֶב <WH7393> Re-chev The chariots אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, of God רִבֹּתַ֣יִם <WH7239> rib-bo-Ta-yim [are] twenty thousand אַלְפֵ֣י <WH505> 'al-Fei [even] thousands שִׁנְאָ֑ן <WH8136> shin-'An; of angels אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord בָ֝֗ם Vam, סִינַ֥י <WH5514> si-Nai [is] among them [as in] Sinai בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> bak-Ko-desh. in the holy

עָ֘לִ֤יתָ <WH5927> 'a-Li-ta Thou hast ascended לַמָּר֨וֹם׀ <WH4791> lam-ma-Rom on high שָׁ֘בִ֤יתָ <WH7617> sha-Vi-ta captive שֶּׁ֗בִי <WH7628> She-vi, thou hast led captivity לָקַ֣חְתָּ <WH3947> la-Kach-ta thou hast received מַ֭תָּנוֹת <WH4979> Mat-ta-not gifts בָּאָדָ֑ם <WH120> ba-'a-Dam; for men וְאַ֥ף <WH637> ve-'Af also ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים <WH5637> sor-Rim, yea [for] the rebellious לִשְׁכֹּ֤ן׀ <WH7931> lish-Kon might dwell יָ֬הּ <WH3050> yah also that the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

בָּ֤ר֣וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed אֲדֹנָי֮ <WH136> 'a-do-Nai [be] the Lord י֤וֹם׀ <WH3117> Yom daily י֥וֹם <WH3117> Yom daily יַֽעֲמָס־ <WH6006> ya-'a-mos- loadeth לָ֗נוּ La-nu, הָ֘אֵ֤ל <WH410> ha-'El us [with benefits even] the God יְֽשׁוּעָתֵ֬נוּ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Te-nu of our salvation סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

הָ֤אֵ֣ל׀ <WH410> ha-'El [He that is] our God לָנוּ֮ la-Nu אֵ֤ל <WH410> 'el [is] the God לְֽמוֹשָׁ֫ע֥וֹת <WH4190> le-mo-Sha-'ot of salvation וְלֵיהוִ֥ה <WH3069> Yah-weh and unto GOD אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; the Lord לַ֝מָּ֗וֶת <WH4194> lam-Ma-vet, from death תּוֹצָאֽוֹת׃ <WH8444> to-tza-'ot. [belong] the issues

אַךְ־ <WH389> 'ach- Surely אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, But God יִמְחַץ֮ <WH4272> yim-Chatz shall wound רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> rosh the head אֹ֫יְבָ֥יו <WH341> 'o-ye-Vav of his enemies קָדְקֹ֥ד <WH6936> ka-de-Kod scalp שֵׂעָ֑ר <WH8181> se-'Ar; [and] the hairy מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <WH1980> mit-hal-Lech, of such an one as goeth on still בַּאֲשָׁמָֽיו׃ <WH817> ba-'a-sha-Mav. in his trespasses

אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar said אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> 'A-do-nai The Lord מִבָּשָׁ֣ן <WH1316> mib-ba-Shan from Bashan אָשִׁ֑יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv; I will bring again אָ֝שִׁ֗יב <WH7725> 'a-Shiv, I will bring [my people] again מִֽמְּצֻל֥וֹת <WH4688> mi-me-tzu-Lot from the depths יָֽם׃ <WH3220> Yam. of the sea

לְמַ֤עַן׀ <WH4616> le-Ma-'an because of תִּֽמְחַ֥ץ <WH4272> tim-Chatz may be dipped רַגְלְךָ֗ <WH7272> rag-le-Cha, That thy foot בְּ֫דָ֥ם <WH1818> be-Dam in the blood לְשׁ֥וֹן <WH3956> le-Shon [and] the tongue כְּלָבֶ֑יךָ <WH3611> ke-la-Vei-cha; of thy dogs מֵאֹיְבִ֥ים <WH341> me-'o-ye-Vim of [thine] enemies מִנֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH4480> min-Ne-hu. They

רָא֣וּ <WH7200> ra-'U They have seen הֲלִיכוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH1979> ha-li-cho-Tei-cha thy goings אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; O God הֲלִ֘יכ֤וֹת <WH1979> ha-Li-Chot [even] the goings אֵלִ֖י <WH410> 'e-Li of my God מַלְכִּ֣י <WH4428> mal-Ki my King בַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> vak-Ko-desh. in the sanctuary

בְּֽ֭מַקְהֵלוֹת <WH4721> Be-mak-he-lot in the congregations בָּרְכ֣וּ <WH1288> ba-re-Chu Bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; ye God יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מִמְּק֥וֹר <WH4726> mi-me-Kor from the fountain יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

תְּנ֥וּ <WH5414> te-Nu Ascribe עֹ֗ז <WH5797> 'Oz, ye strength לֵֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> le-Lo-Him unto God עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- is over יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El [is] over Israel גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ <WH1346> ga-'a-va-To; his excellency וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ <WH5797> ve-'uz-Zo, and his strength בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> bash-she-cha-Kim. [is] in the clouds

נ֤וֹרָ֥א <WH3372> no-Ra [thou art] terrible אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, O God מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ <WH4720> mi-mik-Da-Shei-cha out of thy holy places אֵ֤ל <WH410> 'el the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu Himself נֹתֵ֨ן׀ <WH5414> no-Ten [is] he that giveth עֹ֖ז <WH5797> 'oz strength וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת <WH8592> ve-ta-'a-tzu-Mot and power לָעָ֗ם <WH5971> la-'Am, unto [his] people בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. [be] God
